definition[0]: not allowed, especially because of an official rule
example[0]: Alcohol is strictly forbidden in Saudi Arabia.
example[1]: It is forbidden to smoke at school.
definition[1]: a forbidden place is one that you are not allowed to go to
example[2]: The Great Mosque is forbidden to Christians.
definition[2]: a forbidden activity, subject etc is one that people think that you should not do, talk about etc
example[3]: Sex was always a forbidden topic.
example[4]: Forbidden fruit is always more attractive.
